name: LiveScience
text:
Visualization shows exactly how face masks stop #COVID19 transmission. Without a #mask, droplets produced during coughing can travel up to 12 feet. With a mask, this distance is reduced to just a few inches. 
More here: 
https://t.co/xVPy7rcJej https://t.co/GO39UYL7Qn
